Producer: Steven Bernstein, Brigitte Huff, Keith Kjarval, Mick Partridge
Screenwriter: Adam Bernstein, Steven Bernstein, Michael Moss
Production Co: Unified Pictures, Ozymandias Productions , Media House Capital
Synopsis: The lives of a breast-cancer patient (Samantha Morton) and a researcher (Helen Hunt) who is trying to prove a genetic link to cancer intersect in a groundbreaking study.
Title: Decoding Annie Parker
